comment: Alternate definition of the function relation predicate, cf. ~ dfdisjALTV3 . Reproduction of ~ dffun2 . For the ` X ` axis and the ` Y ` axis you can convert the right side to ` ( A. ` x1 ` A. ` y1 ` A. ` y2 ` ( ( ` x1 ` f ` y1 ` /\ ` x1 ` f ` y2 ` ) -> ` y1 ` = ` y2 ` ) /\ Rel F ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1996.)
